content.title: Unlocking the potential of AI in HE: A Participatory Game-based Approach for Teacher Empowerment
content.description: Our educational Role-Playing Game immerses participants into a fictitious scenario to explore AI's implications in institutional leadership and learning and teaching in higher education. Across five quests, players will identify challenges and explore solutions for AI integration into course development. This innovative approach aims to empower teachers and institutional leaders in understanding and implementing AI technologies in higher education contexts.
